hero.title: African-First AI Language Model
hero.subtitle: The first sovereign Low Resource and Reasoning Language Model optimized for African languages. 65% more efficient tokenization, offline-capable, and built for African cultural reasoning.

features.title: Revolutionary Features
features.subtitle: Built specifically for African languages and cultural contexts

efficiency.title: 65% More Efficient
efficiency.description: Advanced tokenization optimized for African languages, reducing computational requirements while maintaining high accuracy.

offline.title: Offline-Capable
offline.description: Run Namqula completely offline, ensuring data sovereignty and privacy for sensitive applications.

cultural.title: Cultural Reasoning
cultural.description: Trained on diverse African cultural contexts, providing culturally appropriate and contextually aware responses.

sovereign.title: Data Sovereignty
sovereign.description: Keep your data within African borders with our sovereign AI infrastructure and local processing capabilities.

technology.title: Advanced Technology
technology.subtitle: Cutting-edge AI architecture designed for African languages
technology.description: Namqula combines transformer architecture with specialized tokenization techniques optimized for low-resource African languages, delivering superior performance in challenging linguistic environments.

about.title: About Namqula
about.subtitle: Preserving African languages, empowering communities, and advancing AI through collaboration and cultural understanding.
about.missionDesc: Namqula is more than just an AI language model—it's a movement to preserve, celebrate, and advance African languages and cultural heritage through technology and community collaboration.
about.culturalPreservationDesc: Protecting and promoting African languages and cultural heritage for future generations.
about.communityEmpowermentDesc: Building bridges between technology and traditional knowledge through inclusive collaboration.
about.innovationDesc: Developing cutting-edge AI technology specifically designed for African languages and contexts.
about.gameDesc: Our interactive Namqula game at namqula.online serves as a powerful platform for community engagement and data collection.
about.gameContent: An engaging educational game that not only entertains but also collects valuable linguistic and cultural data from our community. Through gameplay, users contribute stories, proverbs, grammar rules, vocabulary, and heritage resources that enrich our language models.
about.feedbackContent: The game provides a direct channel for community input and feedback. Contributors receive recognition for their cultural knowledge, and we use their contributions to continuously improve and expand our language models.
about.contributorsDesc: We collaborate with diverse stakeholders across Africa to build comprehensive language resources and cultural understanding.
about.lecturersDesc: Academic experts in linguistics and culture
about.featuredDesc: Some of our valued community partners who are already contributing to the Namqula ecosystem.
about.oshiwamboDesc: Leading developer of AI-powered Oshiwambo language tools, providing deep access to proverbs, verbs, nouns, and cultural stories.
about.teacherVasquezDesc: Educational institution dedicated to preserving and teaching African languages through innovative methods and community engagement.
about.fixYourLanguageDesc: Platform focused on native Namibian languages with a credible following, providing authentic linguistic resources and cultural content.
about.impactDesc: Our technology serves communities, educators, and cultural enthusiasts across Africa.
about.educationDesc: Teachers use our Oshiwambo chatbot to access authentic proverbs, stories, and grammatical resources. This helps students learn their heritage languages while gaining cultural understanding and historical knowledge.
about.culturalPreservationDesc: Parents and families use our tools to help children maintain connections to their cultural roots. Our platform serves as a bridge between generations, preserving linguistic heritage for the future.
about.communityAccessDesc: Anyone interested in African culture and history can explore proverbs, stories, and linguistic resources. Our platform serves as both an educational tool and a cultural guide for understanding complex linguistic concepts.
about.innovationDevDesc: Our growing contributor network continuously improves our language models. Every story, proverb, and grammatical insight helps us build more accurate and culturally-aware AI systems.
about.joinDesc: Help us preserve and advance African languages. Your contributions, whether through the game, content creation, or collaboration, make a real difference.
